angriff88:
its people like you who make this world a sick place.

and please do the world a favour and get yourself some tolerance tought before abusing the net to spread your sick points of view the next time...

anyhow - i guess nobody will take nazi-scums like you serious. anyway - not in this matter.

so im gonna dl and watch this movie now - if it made you sick ill probably like it.

I haven't downloaded this so I cant say nething bout the quality of the file, but I have the movie and it's very good I think. 
It takes some of the most credible antisemitic arguements in-depth (not just the usual holocaust denial and sieg-heil-sessions) and then tells the viewer why it's all a big, ignorant, childish lie.

I recommend it to everyone, especially to all with their nicks ending with 88(Heil Hitler), and crazy zionists for that matter. they all need perspective.
Can someone PLEASE seed this? Thank you very much.

More nazi propaganda on these comments than the meditation this film provides on modern day confusion and where and how religion and politics come together to prevent idiot violence and mental terrorism...........

This is an excellent movie.  Very thought provoking even if you don't agree with the statements made :-)
Know thine enemy!
